entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet workload --info does not contain a description #27895
  • Custom satellite resource assembly not output when using .NET 7 RC1 #27890
  • SDK searches for Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref version 6.0.10 and cannot find it #27888
  • .Net MAUI issue in the first time usage. #27885

Closed

  • dotnet clean requires a RID if SelfContained=true in project file but no RID is set #27488
  • Failure to find package StyleCop.Analyzers while building source-build #27735
  • SDK 6.0.301 -> 6.0.302 upgrade breaks our build #26557
  • TestGlobalPropertyFlowInSolution failed in CI with UnauthorizedAccessException #27708

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve build stability by ensuring we aren't double publishing everywhere #27899
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27835
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Update the rids in the test projects #27033
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Codeowners for Blazor and Razor parts #27898
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove various timeouts (port to .NET 7) #27889
    7.0.1xx
  • Add wasm-tools-net6 to the list of workloads that will pull in netweb in VS. #27347
    Area-VS
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27863
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add linker notification to fabricbot #27825
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove various timeouts #27699
    feature-dotnetwatch, Area-Watch, 7.0.1xx
  • Make template engine jobs not run in internal build for branches #27842
    Area-Infrastructure, area: dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #27865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Try to make all the the trimmer tests happy #27866
    Area-ILLink

Updated

  • RTM branding #27903
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Mysterious PR you should ignore for now #27798
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1993727 #27667
  • Trusted roots: August 2022 CTL #27824
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type" #27774
    Area-ApiCompat
